verses.verse: And there was a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>; and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> the face <S%H6440>of<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, It is for <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and for his <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, because he put to <S%H4191>death<s%> the <S%H1393>Gibeonites<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H1393>Gibeonites<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1393>them<s%> (now the Gibeonites were not of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, but of the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>; and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto <S%H7586>them<s%>: and Saul <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H5221>slay<s%> them in his <S%H7065>zeal<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>);

and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1393>Gibeonites<s%>, What shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> for <S%H3722>you<s%>? and wherewith shall I make atonement, that ye may <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>?

And the <S%H1393>Gibeonites<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5973>him<s%>, It is no matter of <S%H3701>silver<s%> or <S%H2091>gold<s%> between us and <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, or his <S%H1004>house<s%>; neither is it for us to put any <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H4191>death<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, What ye shall <S%H559>say<s%>, that will I do for <S%H6213>you<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, The <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H3615>consumed<s%> <S%H1819>us<s%>, and that devised against <S%H8045>us<s%>, that we should be destroyed from <S%H3320>remaining<s%> in any of the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>,

let <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> unto <S%H3363>us<s%>, and we will hang them up unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, the <S%H972>chosen<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I will give <S%H5414>them<s%>.

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2550>spared<s%> <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, because of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H7621>oath<s%> that was between <S%H1732>them<s%>, between David and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>.

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7532>Rizpah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H345>Aiah<s%>, whom she <S%H3205>bare<s%> unto <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, <S%H764>Armoni<s%> and <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%>; and the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4324>Michal<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, whom she <S%H3205>bare<s%> to <S%H5741>Adriel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai<s%> the <S%H4259>Meholathite<s%>:

And he <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H1393>Gibeonites<s%>, and they <S%H3363>hanged<s%> them in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> all <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>. And they were put to <S%H4191>death<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8462>days<s%>, at the beginning of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%>.

And <S%H7532>Rizpah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H345>Aiah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>, and <S%H5186>spread<s%> it for her upon the <S%H6697>rock<s%>, from the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%> until <S%H4325>water<s%> was <S%H5413>poured<s%> upon them from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; and she <S%H5414>suffered<s%> neither the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> to <S%H5117>rest<s%> on them by <S%H3119>day<s%>, nor the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>.
And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> what <S%H7532>Rizpah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H345>Aiah<s%>, the <S%H6370>concubine<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, had <S%H6213>done<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> from the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh-gilead<s%>, who had <S%H1589>stolen<s%> them from the <S%H7339>street<s%> of <S%H1052>Beth-shan<s%>, where the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H8511>hanged<s%> <S%H3117>them<s%>, in the day that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> in <S%H1533>Gilboa<s%>;

and he brought <S%H5927>up<s%> from thence the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>: and they <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of them that were <S%H3363>hanged<s%>.

And they <S%H6912>buried<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> in the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> in <S%H6762>Zela<s%>, in the <S%H6913>sepulchre<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>: and they <S%H6213>performed<s%> all that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>. And <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H6279>entreated<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H4421>war<s%> again with <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%>, and his <S%H5650>servants<s%> with <S%H3898>him<s%>, and fought against the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>. And <S%H1732>David<s%> waxed <S%H5774>faint<s%>;

and <S%H3430>Ishbibenob<s%>, who was of the <S%H3211>sons<s%> of the <S%H7497>giant<s%>, the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of whose <S%H7013>spear<s%> was <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H5178>brass<s%> in <S%H4948>weight<s%>, he being <S%H2296>girded<s%> with a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H559>sword<s%>, thought to have <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>.

But <S%H52>Abishai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H5826>succored<s%> <S%H5221>him<s%>, and smote the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, and <S%H4191>killed<s%> <S%H582>him<s%>. Then the men of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, saying, Thou shalt <S%H3318>go<s%> no more out with us to <S%H4421>battle<s%>, that thou <S%H3518>quench<s%> not the <S%H5216>lamp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it came to pass after <S%H310>this<s%>, that there was again <S%H4421>war<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> at <S%H1359>Gob<s%>: then <S%H5444>Sibbecai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H5593>Saph<s%>, who was of the <S%H3211>sons<s%> of the <S%H7497>giant<s%>.

And there was again <S%H4421>war<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> at <S%H1359>Gob<s%>; and <S%H445>Elhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3296>Jaareoregim<s%> the <S%H1022>Beth-lehemite<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite<s%>, the <S%H6086>staff<s%> of whose <S%H2595>spear<s%> was like a <S%H707>weaver<s%>'s <S%H4500>beam<s%>.

And there was again <S%H4421>war<s%> at <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, where was a <S%H376>man<s%> of great <S%H4067>stature<s%>, that had on every <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H676>fingers<s%>, and on every <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H676>toes<s%>, <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> in <S%H4557>number<s%>; and he also was <S%H3205>born<s%> to the <S%H7497>giant<s%>.
And when he <S%H2778>defied<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8092>Shimei<s%>, <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H251>brother<s%>, slew <S%H5221>him<s%>.

These <S%H702>four<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to the <S%H7497>giant<s%> in <S%H1661>Gath<s%>; and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%>.
